snippet: In Patrick Somerville’s novel “This Bright River” two people return to their Wisconsin hometown, where their lives, long ago connected, intersect once again.
abstract: Janet Maslin reviews book This Bright River by Patrick Somerville.
lead_paragraph: In Patrick Somerville’s novel “This Bright River” two people return to their Wisconsin hometown, where their lives, long ago connected, intersect once again.

headline.main: Unmoored and Meandering: Two Twigs Swirl in the Eddies of Life’s Stream
headline.print_headline: Unmoored and Meandering: Two Twigs Swirl in the Eddies of Life’s Stream
